name: Flying School Yearn Bus: Drive Voodoo Vehicle
name_original: Flying School Yearn Bus: Drive Voodoo Vehicle
description:
Start the navigation of your futuristic car and get a chance to ride your favourite type of car in this amazing game of car and bus flying, double modes, super controls and high definition graphics along with these sounds of the fury ride are making this game a fabulous top 3D game of 2017. Flying School Yearn Bus: Drive Voodoo Vehicle is going to be the perfect gameplay for the gameboy who love truck riding. Ready to go high in the air and get the smooth ride, this was a fantasy earlier but now the world has changed your fantasy into real and this is the reason you are going to actually drive a real and flying school bus, car that has wings.
Flying School Yearn Bus: Drive Voodoo Vehicle offer you the chance to be the best school bus of the city!

Welcome to biggest open world Flying car Simulator. In this crazy game you will be flying with an bus. this might seem strange, but this game is really a lot of fun and challenge. Everything including physics are created to be as realistic as a real flying bus as possible.
